text: Ojo on ʙuthoro pojhoe hast, ki ʙo on roh ʙiravand jo onhoro dasthoe hast, ki ʙo on ʙigirand jo casmhoe hast, ki ʙo on ʙuʙinand jo gushoe hast, ki ʙo on ʙisnavand? Pas ma'ʙudone, ki sumo parastis mekuned, cunin cizho dar onho vucud dosta naʙosad, onhoro iʙodat kardani sumo ʙaroi cist? Bigu ej Rasul, ʙaroi in musrikon: «Sarikonatonro ʙixoned va ʙar ziddi man makr kuned va maro muhlat madihed, ʙalki ʙa on sitoʙed. Zero sarparasti man Alloh ast, ki maro sarparasti menamojad
